comment: Ahh yes, I saw that a couple nights ago too Dadro.
I honestly was expecting another "Taken" like movie where Liam Neeson brutally kills people in revenge. While we got some of that, I wasn't expecting the humor.
Yeah movies (and entertainment in general) have been getting oddly gory lately.
Yeah, I had no idea that it was going to be a "comedy". It was just kind of a spur of the moment thing. Thought the same thing that it was just going to be another Taken.
Hadn't even seen a trailer, just knew it was a Liam Neeson revenge movie.
Mhmm, here. found it when looking for other movies that were coming up and saw it.
Friend originally wanted to go see Alita, and I was like. "Bleh..."
I can't get past those ugly CG eyes.

I'd have probably seen it if it wasn't for those eyes. But they completely turned me off to seeing the movie entirely.
Not to mention it's another "You're special, you are the key to everything." movies.
I was just wanting to see Neesom kick some ass instead. XD
Honestly, I don't understand the big fuss about the eyes. Yeah they're strange, but you're gonna let that one thing push you away from seeing it?
